ban.description: bans a member from the guild

targets.description: Mention member(s) or put ID(s) in to ban them. Put a space between each target.

reason.description: The target(s) will see the reason in DMs

duration.description: How long you want to get the target(s) banned.

delete_days_of_messages.description: Delete all messages of the targets of the last n days.

ban.noPerm: {IYou} don't have the permission to do that!

kick.description: kicks a member from the guild

targets.description: Mention member(s) or put ID(s) in to kick them. Put a space between each target.

reason.description: The target(s) will see the reason in DMs

kick.noPerm: {IYou} don't have the permission to do that!

lockchannel.description: Prevents everyone except administrators from writing in a channel

channel.description: the channel you want to lock

reason.description: The reason for locking the channel

mute.description: Timeouts a member for a given time (default: 1h).
mute.usage: Duration options: you need to provide at least one.

reason.description: The target will see the reason in DMs

duration.description: for how much {timeType} you want to mute the target

mute.noPerm: {IYou} don't have the permission to do that!

nukechannel.description: Clears all channel messages by duplicating the channel and then deleting the original one
nukechannel.needConfirm: You need to confirm this action by writing `DELETE CHANNEL` as the confirm option!

purge.description: removes a specific amount of messages

amount.description: The amount of messages to purge

purge.noNumber: Please specify the number of messages to purge next time.
purge.invalidNumber: This is not a valid number!

unlock.description: Unlocks a channel locked with the lock command.

channel.description: The channel you want to unlock

reason.description: The reason for unlocking the channel

unmute.description: lifts the timeout of a member

reason.description: why you want to unmute the target

unmute.noPerm: {IYou} don't have the permission to do that!
